argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.r | |- R = ( RingCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.s | |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.u | |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) |
| 6 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.f | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 5 | #P_ringcbasbas | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( Base ` x ) e. U ) |
| 8 | 2, 5 | #P_setcbas | |- ( ph -> U = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` S ) = U ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( Base ` S ) = U ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( Base ` x ) e. ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 4 | #P_syl6eleqr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( Base ` x ) e. C ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) = ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) : B --> C ) |
| 15 | 6 | #P_feq1d | |- ( ph -> ( F : B --> C <-> ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) : B --> C ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F : B --> C ) |
